widget.name: Telerik.UI.RadTokenInput
widget.title: RadTokenInput
widget.description: A multiple token input providing text suggestions.

property.name: value
property.description: Gets or sets the value of the control. Accepts both an array and a single value.

property.name: itemTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template to be used for rendering the items in the list.

property.name: tagTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template to be used for rendering the selected tags.

property.name: highlightFirst
property.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether RadComboBox should automatically highlight the first shown item.

property.name: filter
property.description: Gets or sets the type of filtration to use when filtering the data items. Possible values include "startswith", "endswith", "contains", "eq"(equals), "neq"(does not equal). Default value is "none".

property.name: minLength
property.description: Gets or sets the minimum amount of characters that should be typed before RadComboBox queries the dataSource.

property.name: placeholder
property.description: Gets or sets the string that appears in the textbox when it has no value.

property.name: maxSelectedItems
property.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of selected items in the control.

property.name: animation
property.description: Gets the animation options to be used for opening/closing the popup.

property.name: autoBind
property.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to bind the widget to the dataSource on initialization.

property.name: dataSource
property.description: Gets or sets the data source of the control.

property.name: dataTextField
property.description: Gets or sets the field of the data item that provides the text content of the list items.

property.name: dataValueField
property.description: Gets or sets the field of the data item that provides the value content of the list items.

property.name: delay
property.description: Gets or sets the delay in ms after which the control will start filtering the dataSource.

property.name: enabled
property.description: Gets or sets the enabled state of the control.

property.name: height
property.description: Gets or sets the height of the drop-down list in pixels.

property.name: headerTemplate
property.description: Specifies a static HTML content, which will be rendered as a header of the popup element.

property.name: ignoreCase
property.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the search should be case sensitive.

property.name: isOpen
property.description: Gets a value indicating whether the list container is currently open.

property.name: readonly
property.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is read-only.

property.name: list
property.description: Gets the jQuery-wrapped list of items in the control.

property.name: element
property.description: Gets the DOM element that hosts this control.

property.name: initialized
property.description: Indicates whether the control is initialized.
